title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 22 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 22 2021
description:
Updates of the Waukesha Christmas parade mass murder. After the way the media handled the Rittenhouse trial, how can we trust them? Waukesha Christmas parade attack suspect was out on "inappropriately low" bond, Clay chastised -- and DA admits. ESPN commentator Jalen Rose lies on air about Jacob Blake. Virgina Lt. Governor, Winsome Sears on CRT: "It's weaved in and out of the curriculum." Bill Maher warns liberals: Woke madness will lead to Democrat wipeout in 2022, invites AOC onto his show for a debate. C&B talk about the new Ghostbusters and other great movies to watch with the family over the holidays.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
